name: Camtasia Studio Project
summary: A CAMPROJ file is a project file created by legacy versions of TechSmith Camtasia, a screen recording and video editing program. It is saved using XML formatting and contains references to audio and video files, as well as a record of video edit, effect, and timeline settings. CAMPROJ files commonly contain software video tutorials and other demonstrations.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
